articles.title: TPG Telecom to review consumer brands after hiring Foxtel, NBN exec - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: TPG Telecom could reduce its business portfolio and remove some of its best-known brands in Australia after hiring a key Foxtel executive to review its products.

articles.author: Selina Ross
articles.title: Fears for wildlife after bean bag bursts on Bruny Island and leaves polystyrene mess - ABC News
articles.description: It is a picture-perfect beach — until you take a closer look to see thousands of tiny polystyrene balls, reportedly from someone bringing a bean bag to the beach. Now, the effort is on to clean it up and minimise the impact on wildlife.
articles.content:
A clean-up effort is underway on Tasmania's Bruny Island after reports of a bean bag bursting on a beach which could pose a risk to local marine life.
